body1: Join over half a million people around the globe who are pursuing answers to life’s deepest questions—and activating a more inspired life.
body2: Wherever you are on your personal journey, we have over 8,000 videos and classes to support your continued growth and fulfillment.
body3: Create an account and help us personalize your recommendations by answering a few quick questions.
body4: Your trial has expired! You won’t be able to access Gaia content until you become a member. But you were going to anyway, right? (Wink,wink.)
loggedInMessage: Hello! Looks like you've already been a member of Gaia—by the way, we miss you! Unfortunately, this offer is only available for those who haven't tried us out yet.
logoutMessage: If you've never had a Gaia membership, you might be logged-in on another person's account. Try logging out and clicking the link in the email again.
